dialog.text: Well, that was a non-event.  Turned up to my team meeting and everyone had already left!  I mean I was only 10 minutes late.  How you doing?

Pete was out with his mates so I thought I would work late last night and I managed to finished off the colour theme for our webpage.  Dead swanky I thought.  Anyway, my alarm didn't go off!  Ran to get on Webex and then no one was there.  Btw are you going to the guest speaker this afternoon?

joins.text: So am I, hopefully it will be useful.
Me neither, I can't face it.

dialog.text: Better go - Tanya is trying to ring me on Slack ::face_with_rolling_eyes::
